Conceits, clinches, flashes, and whimzies Newly studied, with some collections, but those never published before in this kinde. Chamberlain, Robert, b. 1607.
[138] p.
Printed by R. Hodgkinsonne for Daniel Frere and are to be sold at the signe of the Bull in little brittain, London : 1639.
By Robert Chamberlain. Has 299 jests. Signatures: A⁴ B-F¹² G⁶ (-A1, blank?). Imperfect; leaves E10-11 lacking. Some print show-through; some pages marked and stained. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
